definitions.body: resounding music, meditation, musing;—´[[ה]] abs. Ps 9:17, Ps 92:4; cstr. [[הֶגְיוֹן]] Ps 19:15; sf. [[הֶגְיוֹנׇם]] La 3:62; —
resounding music; [[עֲלֵי חִגׇּיוֹן בְּכִנּוֹר]] Ps 92:4 with sounding music upon the lyre (Che); cf. [[סֶָלָה]] ´[[ה]] Ps 9:17 (a musical direction, v. [[סלה]]).

meditation, musing [[אִמְרֵי־פִי וְהֶגְיוֹן לִבִּי]] Ps 19:15 the words of my mouth and the meditation of my heart; also in bad sense = plotting [[שׂׂפְתֵי קָמַי וְהֶגְיוֹנׇם עָלַי]] La 3:62; the lips of those rising against me, and their imagining against me (‖[[מַחְשְׁבׂתָם]] v:La 3:61; cf. I. [[הָגׇה]]
